header.description: How many models this model outperforms on average (over columns).

African-American English Perturbation + Open-ended questions about real-world images ([Goyal et al., 2017](https://arxiv.org/abs/1612.00837)).

Prefix quasi-exact match: Fraction of instances that the predicted output matches the prefix of a correct reference up to light processing.
- Perturbation Fairness: Computes worst case over different fairness perturbations (changing dialect, race of names, gender).

African-American English Perturbation + A-OKVQA ([Schwenk et al., 2022](https://arxiv.org/abs/2206.01718)).

Prefix quasi-exact match: Fraction of instances that the predicted output matches the prefix of a correct reference up to light processing.
- Perturbation Fairness: Computes worst case over different fairness perturbations (changing dialect, race of names, gender).
